website_summaries.verdict: A chew-safe option for those with larger or very food-motivated dogs. Works with iOS- or Android-enabled devices.
pros: The special design ensures there are no easy spots for dogs to chew and the device can emit a special scent to promote calm in an anxious dog
2-way audio and video allow users to interact remotely with their pets and dispense treats
Camera can be mounted to the wall
cons: One of the priciest out there and it only works with PetChatz treats

customer_reviews.title: Makes being away much easier!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my PetChatz!! I am so happy to be able to "call" my dogs when away on vacation. It has made a huge difference to my dogs, and I truly feel it helps them to hear from me when I am gone for an extended period of time. They figured out pretty quickly what the music call means and they run to the PetChatz box to greet me. I love that I can see them and the ability to record their reactions is great. The first time I ever used it, I got fun pic of 3 dogs figuring it out :)
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really awesome. We had a petzi this beats it. I love the claw training tool. It is so cute watching your pet hit it to get a treat. The other thing is they should include night vision to make this thing perfect. It is expensive but very worth it. I did have some technical issues with the unit, but they worked with me to resolve them, overall I am happy and these things are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Snyder-Hill

customer_reviews.title: we received excellent support from the petchatz team and their engineer was ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the petchatz as a gift. Due to an initial setup mistake made from our end, we couldn't get the unit to work and this left us incredibly frustrated. This wasn't a run-of-the-mill error from our end but an unusual one. Despite the case, we received excellent support from the petchatz team and their engineer was quickly able to resolve our issue. The product in itself is pretty damn awesome, but to have the kind of care and concern shown after sales is what differentiates good organisations from the average. Thank you for helping us get back online and connecting with our babies !
customer_reviews.author: Rizwan Kazi

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommed this enough!
customer_reviews.text: The original item arrived defective - which was upsetting to me. Colleen from customer service IMMEDIATELY contacted me to remedy the issue. They are allowing me to try the product again and so far so good! The quality is much better than the first. My cats are still getting used to it but I know they will love it in time. Colleen continues to follow-up with me to ensure I am having a better experience. Thank you Colleen and Petchatz!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome I have a senior fur baby with some heart ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome I have a senior fur baby with some heart issues and it gives me the security to leave the house and know I can still check on her this product is amazing. Wish I had bought it sooner !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and is easy to use, when it works. It never stays online and is constantly trying to connect to the PetChatz network. The app on the phone constantly has various errors. More than half the time I can’t use it. They try to blame it on my network, but i find it interesting that this is the only device I have a problem with.
customer_reviews.author: Maximillian99

customer_reviews.title: We love our Pet Chatz!
customer_reviews.text: We love our PetChatz! We enjoy ours many times a day! Our pups know the treat chime and they can hear a treat drop from many rooms away. All we have to do is hit the chime and the pups come running for yoummy's. Had some trouble setting this up simply due to operator (my) error but their helpful customer service walked us through set up and now we get to see our pups every time we are away from home. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mozeleski

customer_reviews.title: There are days that I’m at the office and away from my boys for longer than I’d like. PetChatz gives my the opportunity to periodically check ...
customer_reviews.text: My PetChatz has been a lifesaver for me and my 2 Morkies. There are days that I’m at the office and away from my boys for longer than I’d like. PetChatz gives my the opportunity to periodically check on them and to let them know I’ll be home soon. I recently have experienced some problems with my unit. The PetChatz support team was extremely helpful in getting the issue resolved. I’d highly recommend this product to pet parents
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and it was easy to configure, and we have had a lot of fun with it ever since. We did have to get some technical support to get it working on our home network, but even on a Saturday afternoon when their support was closed they responded and helped us and followed up to make sure that we got it working and were happy. If you are looking for something fun to do with your pets I would recommend the PetChatz.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great help with all things Tech.
customer_reviews.text: Non-techi but i tried on my own to setup. But had troubles with wife’s Icloud id/pow. Danielle to the rescue, very knowledgeable and patient. We switched to my ipad and sailed thru the install. Now we can look in on our Spoodles and they on us. A great idea and super competent Danielle
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our Pet Chatz! It's super easy to use, simply download an App for your Smartphone and bayou can video and give treats to your pet whenever you want! We were worried our dog wouldn't understand or look into the camera for us but after 1 or 2 times she waits by the camera when we're gone and is ready to chat whenever we are. Highly recommend this if you leave your pet home and want to keep in touch. You must get a video with a treat dispenser as this is what trains the pet and is what she ultimately looks forward too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is my new best friend, I love it my dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: This product is my new best friend, I love it my dogs love it. What a wonderful way to stay in contact with you furbabies while away from home. Custermer service was exceptional. Any questions, no problem ever, their are actually live people that answer the phone and always happy to hear from you. Thank you Petchaz 🐾🐾🐾🐾🐾🐾
customer_reviews.author: Dawna N.

customer_reviews.title: Best pet product I have bought all year.
customer_reviews.text: Love being 'in touch' with my pets when I am out of town. I used it to check up on my dogs while I was traveling in Europe & The Seychelles last fall. I was surprised at how well it worked from halfway around the world!
customer_reviews.author: F. S. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: We love our Petchatz
customer_reviews.text: I love getting to see my boy when I go out and he loves the PetChatz as much as I do. The support was great with help setting it up and my dog learned it in a matter of hours. Now when I am out and he hears the music play, he runs to the unit. Thanks PetChatz.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love the treats and she has a very sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: We had a few hiccups setting this product up. We found you had to set it up on the computer first and then our android devices. My dogs love the treats and she has a very sensitive stomach. Once she hears the PetChatz call her, she runs in and immediately lays down for her treat. So far we really love having our new PetChatz HD Pet Camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Houjak

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Gadget On The Market!
customer_reviews.text: You will love to see the end result! I have enjoyed watching my puppy grow and learn! I was amazed how quickly she associated the ring to the treat - simply amazing and the tutorial was effective and easy to teach my little girl! I feel comfort in knowing I can check in from anywhere. The installation and setup were fast and easy. Tech support has been 5 stars as well! Do not hesitate - worth every penny to me and my miniature schnauzer! 👦🐶
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE OUR PETCHATZ
customer_reviews.text: LOVE OUR PETCHATZ! Definitely worth the money! Our pets love it too, it is quite the conversation at work when we show others we are calling the dog! We did not buy the button where they could be trained to call us because I was afraid they would think it was a toy and chew it up. We are very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: It is great to be able to check in and see what ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you have a fury family at home when you are at of the house! It is great to be able to check in and see what the dogs and cats are doing! It might take them a few times to get used to you speaking to them through the PetChatz but after a few times they will come running! I decided to go with the stand so I am able to move the unit more easily. I have zero complaints and recommend the PetChatz to friends and family! Totally worth the piece of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love PetChatz and so does our pooch!
customer_reviews.text: PetChatz is so cool! So much fun checking in on our fella. He already knows the jingle to come looking for treats. I highly recommend getting the “stand” so you have flexibility on where you place the PetChatz. Customer support was great in helping me with the initial setup and app questions.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Love having peace of mind when leaving Bella
customer_reviews.text: Bella gets to go almost everywhere with me but when she can't I love having the peace of mind that I can now interact with her and know she is safe . It took a few days for her to get used to the sound of me calling and especially the treat dispensing (it scared her at first )and wouldn't go near it. She now comes and sits in front of camera waiting for the treat to dispense . So happy I splurged and got PetChatz. Only negative is I wish it had night vision .
customer_reviews.author: Chad Norris

customer_reviews.title: A great device but expensive
customer_reviews.text: A great device but expensive. Plus all the accessories are pricey as well. They certainly have a one-of-a-kind product and can charge for it. If you're thinking of buying this, I would suggest signing up for their mailing list and waiting for a coupon to save a little bit of money on the product
customer_reviews.author: Shiv

customer_reviews.title: Best way to stay connected with your 4 legged kids!
customer_reviews.text: Best invention ever for pet owners! Now I can check on my cats whenever we are away and from any place near or far that we might be. At first I had problems setting it up but the people at Customer Service are absolutely wonderful and would resolve any issue you may have no matter how long you keep them on the phone. The unit kept going offline but by turning the unit on and off when it happened we seem to have resolved the problem. Our fuzzy friends run to the unit when the music starts and they hear my voice. They know that treats soon follow. Very happy we spent the money. It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to check in on my personal pups and my fosters. It gives me peace of mind to be able to check in and see them snoozing or chewing on a toy. Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plugs explode
customer_reviews.text: This unit would have been great if the plug didn’t explode. After only 6 months of use the plug exploded and now I have an expensive piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. Great for pets and pet parents. Kitty loves it too!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our cat. Knowing how cats don’t like anything that’s not their idea, we were skeptical. Our baby learned this in one day. I don’t know who is having more fun, him or us. He absolutely loves it and we enjoy the entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. I’m on the road the majority of the year. Sometimes I can bring my cat when I’m at a hotel that’s pet friendly. But 75% of the time they aren’t. Getting this has made it easier for me and my cat. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! My dog runs to his PetChatz the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! My dog runs to his PetChatz the second he hears the tone. He loves the treats and my husband and I love knowing that we can check on him whenever we feel the need. The customer service is also excellent. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M.

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I'm finally living the 21st century
customer_reviews.text: I've never felt so in touch with my dog. I feel like I'm finally living the 21st century. I would recommend PetChatz to anyone with a pet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Shim

customer_reviews.title: Love the chat and treat function......
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love the product. We use it whenever we have to be away for most of the day. The only problem is that we have two beagles, and even though we can talk to both of them, the alpha female has claimed the Pet Treatz function for herself, and guards it. The timid female gets hers when we get home. Best we can do. :)
customer_reviews.author: Pat Benadum

customer_reviews.title: Pet Chatz is a great way to check on my kittens during the day while I am at work.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, very useful and fun to have also. I get to see my kittens and give them a few treats. Both my calicos learned to run to this camera before they turned 3 months old. Is was not easy to see them because they were so small that they would be just under the lens, but I could see them running to go under the camera to fetch treats ;-) Now, at 5 and a half months, they know to fetch the treat and then seat in front of the camera so mommy can see them.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Neat features but just a camera
customer_reviews.text: The product has several neat features but some of them don’t work or are not applicable to my situation/dog. The video and treat dispensing work well but the scent feature doesn’t. My older dog doesn’t realize he can see me on the unit and if he hears my voice it increases his anxiety because he can’t find me. The only thing I use this for is to check in on him and occasionally dispense a treat. In my situation it’s just a REALLY expensive/overpriced camera.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased PetChatz as I was planning to go away on vacation and thought of not seeing my fur babies for 10 long days was making me sad . The set up was easy and my kitties adapted fast! Love to chat with them daily. We camp every weekend too and it keeps us all connected! Thank you PetChatz !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can check in on my dog during the night while I am at work! The unit is as good as your Internet, I believe. At first it kept going offline but the instances of that happening have decreased. My daughter, my sons, and grandchildren call her too! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: stephanie stickelman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool to see my pet when I'm at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works great!
customer_reviews.text: It gives me the peace if mind I needed for my new puppy and he actually responds and settles down when seeing me and hearing my voice- It took a day for him to get used to it - first he barked at the new device till he saw and heard me on the screen. Have the paw call but not using yet - he’ll need a little more training, but can’t wait to try
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R. Sinibaldi

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE the PetChatz Pet Camera
customer_reviews.text: My puppies and I LOVE this product. When I am missing them during the day, it is a wonderful break to activate the PetChatz device, see the puppies and give them treats. They LOVE treats !!! I would highly recommend this device to anyone who misses their pet(s) during the workday.
customer_reviews.author: V.M. Wheeler III

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without this!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I LOVE Petchatz!!! I travel to Canada from Texas for work one week per month and always feel so guilty not being with my sweet kitty. Now I can see her, talk to her, & give her treats from another country! It's flawless & I couldn't be happier. We are hooked! Thank you so much, Petchatz!!! This has improved our quality of life! :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Malone

customer_reviews.title: I love the option to dispense treats to them remotely
customer_reviews.text: This camera may be a little pricey but it is worth every penny. I can see my four legged babies when I am away from home. The display picture is very clear. As soon as the dogs hear the chime from the PetChatz letting them know that I am call, they come running. I love the option to dispense treats to them remotely. I have no regrets about this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie Mom

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every pet parent!
customer_reviews.text: I love seeing Chelsea and Bailey while I am at work and on vacation! And they love when they get treats from PetChatz!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen K. Bell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: You know how getting a 8 week old untrained puppy is like? Potty training takes a lot of trial and error and that also means its going to smell a little. So I ordered this thing and it changed my life! Just like that. I am very germophobic and also with smells as well so yeah, I am impressed! Get it! It gets rid of pet smells significantly. Life savior!
customer_reviews.author: Celine Wang

customer_reviews.title: I love that I get to check in with my dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that I get to check in with my dogs when I’m missing them while I’m at work. Set up was easy, customer service is great, and it serves as a great stress relief for me.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it but I haven’t figured out a way to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it but I haven’t figured out a way to link it to multiple phones, only one at a time
customer_reviews.author: Jovonne sweany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Clear image and sound. Love the two-way camera!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer support
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy about this product and more importantly, my 2 Pomeranians are happy. It is fun and it gives you good feelings while you're out at work. Video quality is good. Installation process is also fairly easy. They also have an amazing customer support. Very friendly and easy to work with. I had a problem with my unit and without questions, they sent me a new one. I'm very happy with PetChatz
customer_reviews.author: Ehsanmz

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: Okay, they mostly love it because they know treats come out of it.... but I love it because when I go away I can check on them and they can still hear/see me. One of mine gets very nervous so this helps her. They will often hang out next to the PetChatz just waiting for a treat!
customer_reviews.author: eyeletsewing

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and would highly recommend it. Our dog loves the treats and even knows to go over and touch the monitor because he knows that sometimes treats fall out of the wall. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed to find out there is no night vision! I recorded videos of my pets but still have not been given access to them. It also claims to give you 2 free months of dogtv but I emailed support and the person just kept directing my to dogtv's 14 day free trial. For the cost, I expect better service and a better product. Also, you can bot view your dog on the camera while the dog watches dog tv.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: my husband and i love the petchatz. it's awesome b/c we can see our cats (and they can see us), talk to them, and give them treats whenever we are not home. They recognize our voices & we feel comforted when we are away & they r left w a sitter.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs cakes

customer_reviews.title: Love Our PetChatz
customer_reviews.text: We love being able to give treats to our doggie-daughter, GiGi. It took her a few times to get use to it, but now she loves it. The instructions are simply stated and very direct. We give it five hearts!!!
customer_reviews.author: D M Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: We are on vacation currently and love to use our PetChatz to talk to our dogs every day. They come running the minute they hear the call. I love to talk to them and give them a treat. This is the best item I’ve purchased in a long time. Thanks PetChatz!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lammers

customer_reviews.title: Other than random connectivity issues, I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this product. Its great to be able to interact with my dogs while I'm out of the house. Unfortunately, the system has a few issues where it randomly losses connectivity with the PetChatz server. Nothing resolves this unless you turn the unit on and off. Wifi signal is at full bars so I know the issue is not on my end. Other than this one issue, I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Di Stadio

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for pet lover
customer_reviews.text: Fiance loved this gift. Video quality isn't perfect at times, but overall we still love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Austin

customer_reviews.title: CALLING MY DOG
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very nice to check in on my dog during the day from anywhere and give him a treat. Training for Paw Call right now. Easy setup and most importantly GREAT customer service. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Nama

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! We love it and so does our dog. Get the DogTV too! The customer service is impressive too. I received a Petchatz with a weird connectivity issue and they were very helpful in troubleshooting and sending out a new one once it was determined we were better off replacing. Nice to know someone is there to help
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FaceTime with my poodles!!!
customer_reviews.text: FaceTime with my poodles!!! The device is great and reliable. Can always check in on the dogs and give them treats whenever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!!
customer_reviews.text: A great product that I️ don’t know how we ever lived without! And the customer service team is amazing. Super responsive and helpful! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: falen

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted it to work for us...
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize this had to be installed/mounted over an electrical outlet. I ended up buying the stand separately but that didn't work out for us either. I think the video quality was good enough just don't think it's quite there yet.
customer_reviews.author: lovroflit

customer_reviews.title: It's All About the Conversation (and a treat here and there)
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful way to converse "Chat" with your pet. If you are reading this review you have tuned and turned to the description of and reviews concerning this product. You will not be disappointed . . . this is a remarkable way to view, communicate, listen and deliver a few treats to your four-legged pets. Product workmanship, software and features are top drawer. Easy to install - Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: dthaxton

customer_reviews.title: Doggo loves it and the wife uses it everyday
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! Had issues with connection and after trouble shooting, needed a replacement. Petchatz came through . Doggo loves it and the wife uses it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Ability to have two way interaction is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to call my dog while I’m at work and give her treats! I also love that she can call me! Pic quality could be a little better for the money, but I’m overall very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K. King

customer_reviews.title: Something they didn't tell you!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed to find out that you can only use this by DIRECTLY plugging the unit into an electric outlet. I purchased this for my son and they didn't immediately set it up. Now I find I can't return it! UGGH
customer_reviews.author: TheDancingChef

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Thr instructions on the website videos are comprehensive! The image quality is good, and communication and giving the treat is easy.... Our puppy got used to it from the first day and loves it.... I highly recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Najmeh

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can check in on them
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea. A bit more than my dogs. When I call them they are oblivious. I need to work with them to get the concept. Or they’re just ignoring me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Serra

customer_reviews.title: Beagle approved-
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I removed treats from the unit, my beagle boys liked them to much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now I have peace of mind when I’m out of country or overseas :)
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and quality but pricy ! I highly recommend it for those who want to spend the extra money $$$$$
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Darakjian

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: It's a 3 because of how they handled the situation mixed with the product operating. They gave a refund and made it right and are great in that respect. The idea is awesome. I could not get it to stream to my phone unless I was at home where I didn't need it. It never would connect when I was away. But as I stated they took care of it and were great to work with getting the problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: md

customer_reviews.title: Order your treats early so there is no downtime in rewards.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device. It allows me to communicate with my furry loved one, even while on a detachment away from home. Definitely worth every penny to keep in touch with my fur baby, being in the military.
customer_reviews.author: beaulieu j.

customer_reviews.title: Fun watching the kittens when i was gone!
customer_reviews.text: I had adopted two kittens and was heading on vacation for two weeks and was nervous leaving them alone. Petchatz helped me feel at ease leaving. Of course I had someone looking after them every few days but it was great being able to watch them. And, they came running when they heard the ring!
customer_reviews.author: Holli Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I am able to talk to my dog who has separation anxiety throughout the day while at work. My cats have also learned the device and come running when they hear the chimes. The picture is clear on both ends and the machine functions very well. Customer service has also been outstanding any time I needed to contact them. I recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Can't believe I'm able to talk to my pets and dispense treats!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My pet knows how to communicate with me even though I'm working far away from them. Especially giving them treats, it's a nice way to start our conversation.
customer_reviews.author: JANICE PASCUAL

customer_reviews.title: A No-Brainer for a pet owner!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most fun items we have in our home. We login easy and “Chat” and it plays a tune which calls the pups from around the house. Clear image so they can see us and we can see them. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: 632er

customer_reviews.title: The cost is minimal and picture is good.
customer_reviews.text: I love seeing my kids anytime and giving them treats through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Jerman

customer_reviews.title: I love it .. great for pets !!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT LOVE IT.. customer service it’s above any higher mountain .. They are fabulous .. knowledgeable caring and very patience.. wgen it comes to electronics I suck ... and they took the time to guide me thru it ...yay!! You got to get it one.. my pets love it.. Thank you Ileana Adamos
customer_reviews.author: Ileana Adamos

customer_reviews.title: It’s not as good as it seems
customer_reviews.text: I hate that sometimes I’m far home on a shift and the PetChatz goes offline; when I get home it says it’s connecting to PetChatz network; even if I do have a WiFi extender exclusively for it
customer_reviews.author: KBMD

customer_reviews.title: thank you
customer_reviews.text: Petey doesn't like being left alone, but with the camera, we were able to see that he calms down and rests during the day and isn't stressed while we are away! He loves the treats and is happy to hear our voices while he is alone!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Allows me to interact with my pets while away from home. I have anxiety prone pets and this has been great for them! And super fun to show others your babies!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: My dog has seizures and this camera is a life saver for when I can't be at home. Totally puts my mind at ease to be able to monitor my little bud!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband for his birthday. It could not have been a bigger hit. We call our dog all the time. It didn’t take our dog long to catch on at all considering there were treats involved. I would highly recommend this to any dog lover who has the money to spend on a project such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: had to return it. Picture were great but hard to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bunsy

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried with similar products but this one worth every single penny paid. Is the best option to be in contact with your pet!!
customer_reviews.author: Iliana

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog parents
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love petchatz. We have two mini dachshunds that stay alone in our apartment when we are at work. This helps us say hello when we are not home and give them treats too!! I also love being able to record them. Great picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Love the PetChatz
customer_reviews.text: We just love PetChatz we are able to talk to Mr. MAX and see what he is up to...lol
customer_reviews.author: Charmayne

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought it . The only problem is the treats get stock most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our daughter - she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon D Warnock

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love treats.
customer_reviews.text: Love this and my dogs do too. My puppy was a little confused and tried to lick me through the screen this morning, which to me says it was a successful call.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality isn’t what expected for the price. Setup was challenging
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Picture Quality WHEN it Works!
customer_reviews.text: The PetChatz only works like 30% of the time and when it does work, the picture quality is horrible! For being so expensive, I would expect it to work a lot better and be higher quality. I bought this so I could check on my dog while at school or work but it was a big mistake. It seemed to work fine the first month or so that we had it, but after awhile, I can't even connect to it EVEN while sitting in the same room! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep an eye on our best friends.
customer_reviews.text: Cool product when your on the go but want to check on your pets.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Reeves

customer_reviews.title: The camera is great. I love being able to check on our ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great. I love being able to check on our dogs while we're at work. I just wish there were other options for treats for the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: PetChatz was easy to set up. Step by step instructions are provided and very easy to follow. It comes in handy when I’m away. My cat loves the treats and I love that I can check on her at any given time.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Power cord too short, only available with 2.4Ghz wifi. Would be nice if the treat dropped from the cam can be rolled to the front is towards the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jo C

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money spent on our pets in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Mason P

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Would highly recommend to all pet parents!
customer_reviews.text: My pup Bourbon and I thoroughly enjoy PetChatz! As a dog mom who worries about what Bourbon is up to while I'm away during the day, it gives me so much peace of mind just to be able to check-in on him! The treats are also super tasty for him, and I can tell he gets super excited when I dispense it. It's a great product, and I'd highly recommend it to all pet owners!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Factory deflects camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera have some factory defects. Did not work well. Very unhappy with it. I have this camera only for 3 months. Have to contact to seller and see what is my option are.
customer_reviews.author: Micah A.

customer_reviews.title: So great
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing yet. Works excellent and my pup loves it. I recommend it to everyone, and tell everyone about it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and love it. Prompt shipping and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie M.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was great till the app was updated now it doesn't work. Don't update the app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this product.
customer_reviews.text: Returned to seller 3 times because I kept receiving either missing parts or what seemed to be used items and the connection kept cutting out as well as the image freezing. not worth the money it costs nor the waiting for them to attempt to send something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: But then it got better. Just the video quality is not that great
customer_reviews.text: Well...at the beginning I was having a lot issues .But then it got better. Just the video quality is not that great, even when I have high speed internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: bea

product_meta.title: PetChatz HD: two-way premium audio/HD video pet treat camera w/ DogTv, smart video recording, calming aromatherapy, and motion/sound detection (as seen on The Today Show)
feature_bullets: PetChatz Digital Daycare is a full day of interaction and entertainment for your home alone pet.

An interactive experience with Two Way Video Chats, Treat Dispense, Calming Aromatherapy, Brain (treat) Games, Pet to Parent messaging (PawCall) and entertainment with DOGTV. All in the safety and convenience of your Home. (DOGTV subscription required).
Turn on the sound and motion triggered PetWatch video recording to capture your pet’s activity while you are away.
Pet safe design made in the USA with no corners, edges or cords to chew; attaches securely to your wall (over 100 lb pressure tested) or kennel for optimal pet safety.

Designed by top pet experts to be much more than a treat camera. Controlled from anywhere using an iOS/Android app or desktop computer. Premier US Based PetChatz Customer Care available to help with any questions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars396 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
